title: Sip Or Spill: What Question Made Bert Take A Shot of This Grossness?!
description:
Last week during Sip or Spill, Bert stumped Moe with a super tough question about his sisters, not to mention, what he had to drink was absolutely the grossest.
This week, it was Bert's turn, and Tommy made sure that Bert had something "tasty" to sip! Kikkoman Soy Sauce, Vinegar, Organic great value onion powder, white cheddar popcorn kernels, and a piece of tangelo for garnish.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
